pr_title: Do simple logging for failed export.

timeline.bodyText: We don't seem to use SEVERE anywhere else yet - spans can fail to export for transient reasons (backend is restarting), and observability is not critical to the app anyways, so I'd go with WARNING if not INFO.
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: WARN works for me. Will update.
replies.author: carlosalberto
